verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> of the leper <S%H6879><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his cleansing: <S%H2893><s%> He shall be brought <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> be healed <S%H7495><s%> in <S%H4480><s%> the leper; <S%H6879><s%>

Then shall the priest <S%H3548><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> for him that is to be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> and clean, <S%H2889><s%> and cedar <S%H730><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and hyssop: <S%H231><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> that one <S%H259><s%> of the birds <S%H6833><s%> be killed <S%H7819><s%> in <S%H413><s%> an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> running <S%H2416><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

As for <S%H853><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> bird, <S%H6833><s%> he shall take <S%H3947><s%> it, and the cedar <S%H730><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and the scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and the hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and shall dip <S%H2881><s%> them and the living <S%H2416><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bird <S%H6833><s%> that was killed <S%H7819><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the running <S%H2416><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And he shall sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him that is to be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and shall pronounce him clean, <S%H2891><s%> and shall let <S%H853><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> loose <S%H7971><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the open <S%H6440><s%> field. <S%H7704><s%>

And he that is to be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H853><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and shave off <S%H1548><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his hair, <S%H8181><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> that he may be clean: <S%H2891><s%> and after that <S%H310><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and shall tarry <S%H3427><s%> abroad <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> out of his tent <S%H168><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

But it shall be <S%H1961><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that he shall shave all his hair off <S%H1548><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H8181><s%> <S%H853><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> and his beard <S%H2206><s%> and his eyebrows, <S%H1354><s%> <S%H5869><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> his hair <S%H8181><s%> he shall shave off: <S%H1548><s%> and he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> <S%H853><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> also he shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H853><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> and he shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

And on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> he lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> ewe lamb <S%H3535><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> log <S%H3849><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> that maketh him clean <S%H2891><s%> shall present <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that is to be made clean, <S%H2891><s%> and those things, before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> one <S%H259><s%> he lamb, <S%H3532><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> him for a trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and the log <S%H3849><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall slay <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamb <S%H3532><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> and the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> as the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> is the priest's, <S%H3548><s%> so is the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is most holy: <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of him that is to be cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot: <S%H7272><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the log <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3849><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> it into <S%H5921><s%> the palm <S%H3709><s%> of his own <S%H3548><s%> left hand: <S%H8042><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> <S%H853><s%> his right <S%H3233><s%> finger <S%H676><s%> in <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> his left <S%H8042><s%> hand, <S%H3709><s%> and shall sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And of the rest <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3499><s%> of the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> his hand <S%H3709><s%> shall the priest <S%H3548><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of him that is to be cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot, <S%H7272><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%>

And the remnant <S%H3498><s%> of the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> hand <S%H3709><s%> he shall pour <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of him that is to be cleansed: <S%H2891><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him that is to be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> from his uncleanness; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2932><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him, and he shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> be poor, <S%H1800><s%> and cannot get so much; <S%H369><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5381><s%> then he shall take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> for a trespass offering <S%H817><s%> to be waved, <S%H8573><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him, and one <S%H259><s%> tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and a log <S%H3849><s%> of oil; <S%H8081><s%>

And two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or <S%H176><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> he is able to get; <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the one <S%H259><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> a burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> them on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> for his cleansing <S%H2893><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and the log <S%H3849><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of him that is to be cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot: <S%H7272><s%>
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pour <S%H3332><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the palm <S%H3709><s%> of his own <S%H3548><s%> left hand: <S%H8042><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> with his right <S%H3233><s%> finger <S%H676><s%> some of <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> his left <S%H8042><s%> hand <S%H3709><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> his hand <S%H3709><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of him that is to be cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot, <S%H7272><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%>

And the rest <S%H3498><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H5921><s%> the priest's <S%H3548><s%> hand <S%H3709><s%> he shall put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of him that is to be cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> such as <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> he can get; <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> he is able to get, <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the meat offering: <S%H4503><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him that is to be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of him in whom <S%H834><s%> is the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy, <S%H6883><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> able to get <S%H5381><s%> that which pertaineth to his cleansing. <S%H2893><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> ye be come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to you for a possession, <S%H272><s%> and I put <S%H5414><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession; <S%H272><s%>

And he that owneth <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and tell <S%H5046><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> It seemeth <S%H7200><s%> to me there is as it were a plague <S%H5061><s%> in the house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> that they empty <S%H6437><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> go <S%H935><s%> into it to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague, <S%H5061><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> made unclean: <S%H2930><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house: <S%H1004><s%>

And he shall look on <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague, <S%H5061><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> be in the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> with hollow streaks, <S%H8258><s%> greenish <S%H3422><s%> or <S%H176><s%> reddish, <S%H125><s%> which in sight <S%H4758><s%> are lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the wall; <S%H7023><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and shut up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall come again <S%H7725><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and shall look: <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> be spread <S%H6581><s%> in the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> that they take away <S%H2502><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> <S%H2004><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> is, and they shall cast <S%H7993><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> an unclean <S%H2931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H413><s%> the city: <S%H5892><s%>

And he shall cause the house <S%H1004><s%> to be scraped <S%H7106><s%> within <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and they shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they scrape off <S%H7096><s%> without <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> into <S%H413><s%> an unclean <S%H2931><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> other <S%H312><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and put <S%H935><s%> them in <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H8478><s%> of those stones; <S%H68><s%> and he shall take <S%H3947><s%> other <S%H312><s%> mortar, <S%H6083><s%> and shall plaster <S%H2902><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%>
